home.sectionDesc: Located in Ningxia Helan Industrial Park, covering 130,000 square meters, we are dedicated to advancing the field of guanidine salts and pharmaceutical intermediates.
home.pharmaDesc: World's largest single-line production facility for Metformin Hydrochloride, ensuring global supply stability.
home.nutritionDesc: High-quality Creatine Monohydrate and GAA improving livestock health and growth performance.
home.materialsDesc: Advanced Dicyandiamide (DICY) and curing agents for the next generation of electronic materials.
home.qualityDesc: We employ advanced processing technology and imported equipment, adhering to GMP quality management systems. Our facility boasts an annual capacity of 12,500 tons of Metformin HCL, 10,000 tons of GAA, and 15,000 tons of Creatine series products.
home.newsTitle: Advancing the future of specialty chemicals through strategic partnerships.

metformin.name: Metformin Hydrochloride
metformin.description: High-quality pharmaceutical raw material used primarily for the treatment of type 2 diabetes. Produced in the world's largest single-line production facility.

creatine.name: Creatine Monohydrate
creatine.description: Premium nutritional supplement widely used in sports nutrition and health products to enhance muscle strength and recovery.

gaa.name: Guanidinoacetic Acid (GAA)
gaa.description: A precursor to creatine, used as a highly effective feed additive to improve growth performance in livestock.

dicy.name: Epoxy Resin Curing Agent (DICY)
dicy.description: Super-fine Dicyandiamide used as a latent curing agent for epoxy resins, offering excellent stability and adhesive properties.

accelerator.name: Accelerator
accelerator.description: Specialized chemical accelerator used to speed up reaction processes in various industrial applications.

sodium.name: Sodium Sarcosinate
sodium.description: An amino acid derivative used in the production of biodegradable surfactants and toothpaste.
